name: Escape from Withergarde
description:
In Escape from Withergarde - Prelude you get to play the first part of a game where you shoulder the role of a captive girl, trying to escape from a mystical order that has been collecting and experimenting on children with special powers.

This is a very short game, and it was mostly made as a project to learn some stuff in Unity, Still, I hope you have fun playing it! Please feel free to leave a comment if you like it or feel that I could improve the game somehow.
